scripts.publish:layer: aws lambda publish-layer-version --layer-name shared_dep_layer --compatible-runtimes nodejs18.x --zip-file fileb://aws/layers/shared_dep_layer.zip
scripts.auth:deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file aws/cloudformation/auth.yml --stack-name RojoParkAuth --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM
scripts.file:deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file aws/cloudformation/files.yml --stack-name RojoParkFiles --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM
